title: Mobile-Based Algebra Inequality Formative Assessment and Feedback Project

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in elementary algebra (linear equations, variable application) and basic smart device usage
context.additional_context: For working professionals, conducted on a flexible schedule outside work hours, utilizing digital devices in an asynchronous learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the process of converting real-world problems into algebraic inequalities over 80% of the time.
Revise and improve their solution strategies at least twice based on peer and instructor feedback.
Use mobile devices to create a 3-minute oral presentation video and upload it to a shared platform.

resources: CinchCast or Similar Audio/Video Sharing Platforms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
